subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets have not affixed patches to their uniform sleeves in honor of Nelson Doubleday Jr. (who died on June 17), which makes them something of an outlier in Major League Baseball.
snippet: The Mets have not affixed patches to their uniform sleeves in honor of Nelson Doubleday Jr. (who died on June 17), which makes them something of an outlier in Major League Baseball.
